note: We are all here on this planet just trying to make it through the day. I’m here to see, hear, & love. OCD. Panic disorder. Neurodivergent. BPD. BPT1.  Living life in sobriety & learning to love myself. Growing & healing. Learning to accept my ugly parts just as much as the pretty ones. My kids are my world. My main purpose in this life is to be a phenomenal mother because that’s what they absolutely deserve.  You matter. You are loved. You are a divine creation. You are held.
